allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: update venue to Taj Ambad and add accurate travel info

- Update venue details with correct Taj Ambad address and website
- Add direct flight routes from Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad to Nashik
- Update train info with Nashik Road station details
- Fix road distances and add Shirdi/Aurangabad routes
- Replace Radisson references with Taj Ambad in FAQs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add dark burgundy theme with maximalist floral design

- Change background from cream to deep burgundy \(#572932\)
- Add elaborate SVG floral decorations \(corners, borders, dividers\)
- Update all text colors to white/gold for dark background contrast
- Change button colors from gold to forest green
- Remove logo from header navigation
- Add wedding logo to public assets
- Update all pages \(Home, Events, RSVP, Travel, Ceremonies\) for dark theme

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
